name: Portal
description: A ground-breaking single-player puzzle-platformer set in the mysterious Aperture Science Laboratories, focusing on the use of a portal gun to solve spatial puzzles.

name: Portal 2
description: The epic sequel featuring an expanded single-player campaign with new puzzle mechanics and a dedicated two-player cooperative mode.

name: Half-Life
description: The legendary debut of Gordon Freeman, blending intense action and continuous storytelling in the Black Mesa Research Facility.

name: Half-Life 2
description: Set years after the original, Gordon Freeman joins the resistance against the alien Combine in City 17, featuring advanced physics-based gameplay.

name: Half-Life: Alyx
description: The return to the Half-Life series in VR, following Alyx Vance's fight against the Combine between the events of Half-Life and Half-Life 2.

name: Counter-Strike: Source
description: A complete remake of the original Counter-Strike using the Source engine, featuring updated graphics and physics while maintaining the classic tactical gameplay.

name: Garry's Mod
description: A physics sandbox that allows players to manipulate objects and experiment with physics using assets from various Source engine games.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
description: An elite, tactical team-based shooter where superior planning and execution are key to victory, featuring highly destructible environments.
